ComicInfo.Summary:
"The Forgery" (6 pages) written by Wyatt Gwyon, penciled by Mike Sekowsky, inked by Romeo Tanghal, lettered by Jean Simek and colored by Jerry Serpe."Fire of the Gods" (5 pages) written by Paul Kupperberg, penciled by Don Heck, inked by John Celardo, lettered by Al De Guzman and colored by Bob Le Rose."Ghost Patrol" (6 pages) written by Bob Rozakis, penciled by George Ruppert, inked by Dan Adkins, lettered by Todd Klein and colored by Bob Le Rose.Notes:
This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, Wonder Woman in "The Golden Treasure".
